name: Greaves of Faith
conquest_skill_description: Jabel's will to win increases her damage dealt by 30%.
expedition_skill_description: Steadfast faith grants Defender Troops an extra 15% Lethality.

name: Rabbitgear Cannon
conquest_skill_description: Saul's determination under pressure increases his attack by 24%.
expedition_skill_description: Saul's tactics increase Defender Troops' Attack by 15%.

name: Bands of Tyre
conquest_skill_description: Helga's fury increases her damage dealt by 30%.
expedition_skill_description: Helga joins the rally, adding 15% Lethality to Rally Troops.

name: Mistweaver
conquest_skill_description: Marlin's brew heals the weakest hero by up to 15% of his Attack with every strike.
expedition_skill_description: Marlin leads from the front, increasing Rally Squads' Lethality by 15%.

name: The Unrighteous
conquest_skill_description: Once Agony Rush triggers, Zoe gains up to 24% Attack for the rest of the battle.
expedition_skill_description: Zoe demands excellence from the garrison, increasing Defender Squads' Attack by 15%.

name: Revelation
conquest_skill_description: Soldiers swear by Hilde's everyday miracles, increasing her healing effects by 70%.
expedition_skill_description: Hilde's confidence is infectious, increasing Defender Squads' Health by 15%.

name: Aegis of Fate
conquest_skill_description: Amadeus parries incoming blows, reducing damage taken by 30%.
expedition_skill_description: Amadeus' sword-tailored formations increase Rally Attack by 15%.

name: Wanderwail
conquest_skill_description: Jaeger silences and prevents the target from using skills for up to 5s while dealing heavy damage.
expedition_skill_description: Jaeger increases Defender Squads' Health by 15% through rousing song.

expedition_skill_description: A paladin must always lead by example from the front. Eric increases Defender Squad Defense by 15%.

conquest_skill_description: Petra increases the upper and lower limit of her fluctuating skills by 150%.
expedition_skill_description: Petra's cards reveal the right moment to strike, increasing Rally Squad Attack by 15%.
